name: Shedinja
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.

abilities.name: Empty Shell
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is Knocked Out, your opponent can’t take any Prize cards for it.

attacks.name: Cursed Drop
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.
